document.full_text: chile on friday upgraded a tsunami alert for its coastline and remote easter island territory after waves triggered by a massive earthquake in japan hit hawaii, and said it would evacuate flood-prone areas along the mainland coast.
document.title: chile upgrades tsunami alert for coast and easter island
lines_and_colors: chile on friday upgraded a tsunami alert for its coastline and remote easter island territory after waves triggered by a massive earthquake in japan hit hawaii, and said it would evacuate flood-prone areas along the mainland coast.
